# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a type-erased value that wraps the specified layout.

## Declaration

```swift
init<L>(_ layout: L) where L : Layout
```

## Discussion

You can switch between type-erased layouts without losing the state of the subviews.
title: init(_:)
